name: Stunfisk
description: The Trap Pokémon. It conceals itself in the mud of the seashore. Then it waits. When prey touch it, it delivers a jolt of electricity.

abilities.name: Static
abilities.description: When this Pokémon is hit by a melee attack, roll a d4. On a result of 4, the attacker takes an amount of electric damage equal to this Pokemon's proficiency bonus.

abilities.name: Limber
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to being paralyzed.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to Sandstorm damage. In addition, its AC increases by 2 in desert terrain, or during a Sandstorm.
